label: TransportSettingTemperature
comment: Temperature settings for a transport movement, such as a required storage temperature range.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the type of transport setting temperature [Reference United Nations Code List (UNCL) 6245].

objectProperties.comment: Informational instructions for achieving, maintaining, using or responding to this transport setting temperature.
A measure of a maximum value for this sustainability characteristic.
A measure of a minimum value for this sustainability characteristic.
The measure of the value of this specified temperature, such as a temperature value of ten degrees Celsius.

referencedBy.comment: A temperature setting for this piece of associated transport equipment, such as storage temperature or operational temperature.
The transport temperature setting for this supply chain consignment item.
A transport related temperature setting applicable to these handling instructions.
A temperature setting for this piece of associated transport equipment, such as storage temperature or operational temperature.
